scripts.create-dist: mkdir dist && mkdir dist/app && mkdir dist/app/components && mkdir dist/fonts && mkdir dist/static && mkdir dist/app/static
scripts.copy-html: cp index-dist.html dist/index.html && cp app/components/*.html dist/app/components
scripts.copy-static: cp app/static/* dist/static && cp app/static/* dist/app/static
scripts.copy-nm-files2: cp node_modules/jquery/dist/jquery.min.js dist && cp node_modules/core-js/client/shim.min.js dist
scripts.copy-nm-files3: cp node_modules/systemjs/dist/system.src.js dist && cp node_modules/zone.js/dist/zone.min.js dist
scripts.copy-nm-files: npm run copy-nm-files1 && npm run copy-nm-files2 && npm run copy-nm-files3 && npm run copy-nm-files4 && npm run copy-nm-files5
scripts.copy: npm run copy-html && npm run copy-css && npm run copy-nm-files && npm run copy-static
scripts.minify: npm run minify-js && npm run minify-css
scripts.dist-zip: zip -r dist.zip dist/* && mv dist.zip dist
scripts.make-dist: npm run clean-dist && npm run compile && npm run create-dist && npm run copy && npm run bundle  && npm run minify && npm run dist-zip
scripts.deploy: npm run make-dist && npm run deploy-ec2-0
